trans-unit.source: Represents a class that is used as an argument to set the state of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma classe que é usada como um argumento para definir o estado de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> allows for setting the state from the host application.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> permite definir o estado do aplicativo host.

trans-unit.source: This enables the host application to override the current state of a state machine.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que o aplicativo de host substituir o estado atual de uma máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: This can be accomplished by enqueuing an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateEventArgs> class to the WorkflowQueue named by the constant <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.SetStateQueueName?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode ser feito, colocando uma instância do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateEventArgs> classe para o WorkflowQueue chamado pela constante <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.SetStateQueueName?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: A simpler way to accomplish this is to use the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.SetState%2A> method in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> class.
trans-unit.target: Uma maneira simples de fazer isso é usar o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.SetState%2A> método o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> classe.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.SetState%2A> method to perform a SetState operation from the host, or you can do it yourself by enqueuing an event to the state machine workflow as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.SetState%2A> método para executar uma operação SetState do host, ou você pode fazer isso por conta própria, colocando um evento para o fluxo de trabalho de máquina de estado como mostrado no exemplo a seguir.

trans-unit.source: The state machine workflow uses a special queue called `SetStateQueue` to listen to these special events.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo de trabalho de máquina de estado usa uma fila especial chamada `SetStateQueue` para escutar esses eventos especiais.

trans-unit.source: The state to set the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> to.
trans-unit.target: O estado para o qual definir o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state to set the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado para o qual definir o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The state to set the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> to.
trans-unit.target: O estado para o qual definir o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.
